input_args.passage: 'George Albert Smith - Wikipedia | George Albert Smith Sr. (April 4, 1870 – April 4, 1951) was an American religious leader who served as the eighth president of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints (LDS Church)., American religious leader who served as the eighth president of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints (LDS Church)'
input_args.claim: 'He had a distinguished career as a Church leader despite his fragile health and impaired eyesight.'
